mapper.select: SELECT lodge_no, mem_no, bc.building_case_no, bc.building_case, l.lodge_case_no, lodge_case, lodge_name, lodge_capacity, lodge_room, lodge_addr, convenient_facility, convenient_area, ready_time, stay_cost, check_in_time, regit_date, latitude, longitude FROM lodge l , lodge_case lc, building_case bc WHERE l.lodge_case_no = lc.lodge_case_no AND l.lodge_case_no = bc.building_case_no AND lodge_no = 143
SELECT image_no, origin_name, stored_name, lodge_no, mem_no FROM image WHERE lodge_no = 143
SELECT convenient_facility FROM lodge WHERE lodge_no = 143
SELECT c.comment_no,c.parent_comment_no,c.lodge_no,c.contents,m.mem_no,m.mem_name,written_time FROM comment_tb c,member m WHERE c.mem_no = m.mem_no AND lodge_no = 143 ORDER BY comment_no desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE lodge_no = ${lodge_no}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO comment_tb( comment_no, lodge_no, contents, mem_no
) VALUES(comment_seq.nextval,#{lodge_no},#{contents},#{mem_no})
INSERT INTO favorite(favorite_no, mem_no, lodge_no) VALUES(favorite_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{lodge_no})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favorite WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no}
SELECT lodge_no, lodge_case_no, lodge_name, lodge_room, lodge_addr, convenient_facility, convenient_area, ready_time, check_in_time, stay_cost FROM lodge WHERE lodge_no = #{lodge_no}
